description:
Did you know you can actually make money while you sleep! We know, it does sound like a words of tall-tales and infomercials.

But what if you could. We do!

What if you could make a passive income after only a day's worth of work. Well, thanks to the course and the tools we show you, it is possible. We are a small team of affiliate marketers and we can walk you through all the same steps we take to earn cash 24 hours per day with little to effort on our part.

This course is meant to be a quick yet detailed overview of the system we have spent the last year developing.

Overview of Content:

  • Setting up a website and hosting
  • Working with affiliate links
  • Branding
  • Marketing and Content Development

Target Audience:

  • People who want to make passive income online but are not sure where to start
  • People that have at least a basic working knowledge of web applications

Content:

  • Primarily based around video lectures; supplemental reference documentation is also included
title: Passive Income with Affiliate Marketing on a Review Site
